CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Quote'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Renewal') ), IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__c), text(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_TypePlanning__c) = "Planning Tournant" ), 0, CASE( LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_TypePlanning__c, "Planning Classique", IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c), LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c = 0 ), 0, (LPCR_CongesJours__c / LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c) * (365 / (SBQQ__EndDate__c - SBQQ__StartDate__c)) ), "Multi-Planning", IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c), LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c = 0 ), 0, (LPCR_CongesJours__c / LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c) * (365 / (SBQQ__EndDate__c - SBQQ__StartDate__c)) ), 0 ) ), IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__c), text(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_TypePlanning__c) = "Planning Tournant" ), 0, CASE( LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_TypePlanning__c, "Planning Classique", IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c), LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c = 0 ), 0, (LPCR_CongesJours__c / LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_NombreJoursAccueil__c) * (365 / (SBQQ__EndDate__c - SBQQ__MasterContract__r.StartDate)) ), "Multi-Planning", IF( OR( ISBLANK(LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c), LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c = 0 ), 0, (LPCR_CongesJours__c / LPCR_PlanningEnfant__r.LPCR_MoyenneJoursSemaine__c) * (365 / (SBQQ__EndDate__c - SBQQ__MasterContract__r.StartDate)) ), 0 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Conges Semaine
